amendment.description: Amendment increases funding for the civil rights division within the Department of Agriculture by $1.5 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase funds appropriated in the bill for civil rights enforcement within the Department of Agriculture by $1.5 million. The increase would be offset by a comensurate reduction of funding in the National Agriculture Statistics Service.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Wynn amendment (A008) Agreed to by voice vote.
